mutants.code:
def is_alphanumeric_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)
    return filtered_string != filtered_string[::-1]

def is_alphanumeric_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = 'MUTATED'.join(alphanumeric_chars)
    return filtered_string == filtered_string[::-1]

def is_alphanumeric_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)
    return filtered_string == filtered_string[::+1]

def is_alphanumeric_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)
    return filtered_string == filtered_string[::-2]

    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)

    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)

def is_alphanumeric_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    s = s.lower()
    alphanumeric_chars = [char for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    filtered_string = ''.join(alphanumeric_chars)
    return filtered_string == filtered_string[::--1]
